name: Fighter Crew
description:
In this 2D arcade dogfighting game, you and your friend will fight for the British Royal Air Force to prevent the Germans taking control of the skies. You are the last hope for Britain - if the skies are lost an invasion will soon follow. 

Fighter Crew is a game for two local players controlling a twin seater WW2 fighter plane. One of you will fly and the other will control the turret. 

Dodge, dive, shoot and blast your way through 10 distinct levels. Encounter bombers, ace pilots, trucks, fortifications and more as you take the fight back to the enemy.
